name: Counter of  C/C++ source lines and bytes
short_description:
cncc : Version 1.4.0

Copyright (C) 2003-2004, 2015  Alex Vinokur
This is free software; see the source for copying conditions.
There is NO warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.



----------------------------------------------

NAME
       cncc - count C/C++ source lines and bytes

SYNOPSIS
       cncc [OPTIONS]... [FILE]...

DESCRIPTION
       Count code-lines, empty-lines, comment-lines, 
       code-fields, empty-fields, comment-fields of C/C++-sources 
       which
